formalpara.title: Internal help for this function in Asterisk 1.6:

para.screen:
-= Info about function 'DIALPLAN_EXISTS' =-
[Syntax] DIALPLAN_EXISTS(context[,extension[,priority]])
[Synopsis] Checks the existence of a dialplan target.
[Description] This function returns 1 if the target exits. Otherwise, it returns 0.

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.4 to 1.6:
